sys_ui_script.description: Simple injector that loads the AIAB Chat SP widget in an iframe. The widget handles its own floating button, dialog, snooze, etc.
sys_ui_script.name: AIAB Chat Iframe Injector

sys_update_version.name: sys_ui_script_5af209e2836eb2104d4fccb6feaad331
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_script"><sys_ui_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Simple injector that loads the AIAB Chat SP widget in an iframe. The widget handles its own floating button, dialog, snooze, etc.</description><global>true</global><ignore_in_now_experience>false</ignore_in_now_experience><name>AIAB Chat Iframe Injector</name><script><![CDATA[// AIAB Chat Iframe Injector
// Injects the SP widget iframe on UI16 pages.
(function() {
  console.log('AIAB Chat Iframe Injector: Starting...', window.location.pathname);
  
  // Skip Service Portal pages (check both current window and top)
  var pathname = window.location.pathname;
  try {
    pathname = window.top.location.pathname;
  } catch (e) {
    // Cross-origin, use current window
  }
  
  if (pathname.indexOf('/sp') === 0 ||
      pathname.indexOf('/$sp.do') === 0 ||
      pathname.indexOf('/aiab') === 0 ||
      pathname.indexOf('/now/') === 0) {
    console.log('AIAB Chat Iframe Injector: Service Portal or Workspace page, skipping');
    return;
  }
  
  // Skip if already injected in top document
  try {
    if (window.top.document.getElementById('aiab-chat-iframe')) {
      console.log('AIAB Chat Iframe Injector: Already injected, skipping');
      return;
    }
  } catch (e) {
    console.log('AIAB Chat Iframe Injector: Cannot access top document, skipping');
    return;
  }
  
  // Mark that we're attempting injection (prevent race conditions from multiple frames)
  try {
    if (window.top._aiabChatInjecting) {
      console.log('AIAB Chat Iframe Injector: Another frame is already injecting, skipping');
      return;
    }
    window.top._aiabChatInjecting = true;
  } catch (e) {
    // Can't set flag, continue anyway
  }
  
  console.log('AIAB Chat Iframe Injector: Checking if chat is enabled...');
  
  // Check if GlideAjax is available
  if (typeof GlideAjax === 'undefined') {
    console.log('AIAB Chat Iframe Injector: GlideAjax not available in this frame, skipping');
    try { window.top._aiabChatInjecting = false; } catch (e) {}
    return;
  }
  
  // Check if chat is enabled for this user
  var ga = new GlideAjax('x_1756832_aiab.aiabAjax');
  ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'isChatEnabled');
  ga.getXMLAnswer(function(response) {
    console.log('AIAB Chat Iframe Injector: isChatEnabled response:', response);
    
    if (response !== 'true') {
      console.log('AIAB Chat Iframe Injector: Chat not enabled for user, response was:', JSON.stringify(response));
      try { window.top._aiabChatInjecting = false; } catch (e) {}
      return;
    }
    
    // Double-check it wasn't injected while we waited for AJAX
    try {
      if (window.top.document.getElementById('aiab-chat-iframe')) {
        console.log('AIAB Chat Iframe Injector: Was injected while waiting, skipping');
        return;
      }
    } catch (e) {
      return;
    }
    
    console.log('AIAB Chat Iframe Injector: Chat is enabled, creating iframe...');
    
    // Build iframe URL using /aiab portal
    var iframeSrc = '/aiab?id=aiab_chat';
    
    // Try to get record context from gsft_main frame
    try {
      var mainFrame = window.top.document.getElementById('gsft_main');
      if (mainFrame && mainFrame.contentWindow) {
        var g_form = mainFrame.contentWindow.g_form;
        if (g_form && g_form.getTableName && g_form.getUniqueValue) {
          var recordTable = g_form.getTableName() || '';
          var recordSysId = g_form.getUniqueValue() || '';
          var recordDisplay = '';
          if (g_form.getValue) {
            recordDisplay = g_form.getValue('number') || g_form.getValue('name') || '';
          }
          
          if (recordTable && recordSysId) {
            iframeSrc += '&record_table=' + encodeURIComponent(recordTable);
            iframeSrc += '&record_sys_id=' + encodeURIComponent(recordSysId);
            if (recordDisplay) {
              iframeSrc += '&record_display=' + encodeURIComponent(recordDisplay);
            }
            console.log('AIAB Chat Iframe Injector: Added record context:', recordTable, recordSysId);
          }
        }
      }
    } catch (e) {
      console.warn('AIAB Chat Iframe Injector: Could not get record context', e);
    }
    
    console.log('AIAB Chat Iframe Injector: Iframe src:', iframeSrc);
    
    // Create iframe - positioned bottom-right, sized for widget
    var iframe = document.createElement('iframe');
    iframe.id = 'aiab-chat-iframe';
    iframe.src = iframeSrc;
    iframe.style.cssText = 'position:fixed;bottom:0;right:0;width:420px;height:560px;border:none;z-index:10000;background:transparent;pointer-events:auto;';
    iframe.setAttribute('allowtransparency', 'true');
    
    try {
      window.top.document.body.appendChild(iframe);
      console.log('AIAB Chat Iframe Injector: Iframe appended to top document body');
    } catch (e) {
      console.error('AIAB Chat Iframe Injector: Failed to append iframe to top document', e);
    }
  });
})();]]></script><script_name/><sys_class_name>sys_ui_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>opencode</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2026-01-22 22:55:31</sys_created_on><sys_id>5af209e2836eb2104d4fccb6feaad331</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AIAB Chat Iframe Injector</sys_name><sys_package display_value="AI in a Box" source="0439d1f593948210071230a97bba1016">0439d1f593948210071230a97bba1016</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="AI in a Box">0439d1f593948210071230a97bba1016</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_script_5af209e2836eb2104d4fccb6feaad331</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>opencode</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2026-01-22 23:22:50</sys_updated_on><ui_type>0</ui_type><use_scoped_format>false</use_scoped_format></sys_ui_script></record_update>
